params.name: sentence
params.description: The text that needs to be cuted.

params.name: cut_all
params.description: Whether to use the full mode. If True,using full mode that gets all the possible words from thesentence, which is fast but not accurate. If False, usingaccurate mode that attempts to cut the sentence into the mostaccurate segmentations, which is suitable for text analysis.Default: False.

params.name: use_hmm
params.description: Whether to use the HMM model. Default: True.
